Changelog
=========

Version 0.1.0 (Current)
-----------------------

**Features**:
- 22 production-ready models
- 51 preprocessing steps
- 17 evaluation metrics
- Hyperparameter tuning
- Multi-model comparison
- Model ensembling
- Panel/grouped modeling
- Interactive visualizations

**Models**:
- Linear: linear_reg, poisson_reg, gen_additive_mod
- Tree: decision_tree, rand_forest, boost_tree
- SVM: svm_rbf, svm_linear
- Instance: nearest_neighbor, mars, mlp
- Time Series: arima_reg, prophet_reg, exp_smoothing, seasonal_reg, recursive_reg
- Hybrid: arima_boost, prophet_boost
- Baseline: null_model, naive_reg

**Tests**: 1019+ passing tests

See Also
--------

* .claude_plans/projectplan.md - Detailed project history
